title: Luden's procs Thunderlord's
body: Some of you probably already know of this but I've been having a lot of fun lately after figuring it out; Luden's procs Thunderlords. So for example on Ahri you can proc Luden's with Q on the way out and then Thunderlords when it returns for some stupid burst like in the video i linked. IMO any champ that can abuse this is a god mid laner. Just thought I'd share

replies.body: {{champion:432}} passive with his auto counts for 2 stacks of thunderlords so if u have a ludens u instantly get it in an auto or u can get hextech revolver and do the same
